free_text.Learning outcomes: [li] Good understanding of economic mechanisms, particularly as regards environmental issues.[br/][li] Capacity to evaluate assessments of environmental impacts and natural resources.[br/][li] Capacity to contribute to the formulation of environmental and climate change policies.[br/]
free_text.Content: [li] Introduction to economics: supply, demand, markets and prices (3h).[br/][li] Economic decision making, in particular cost-benefit analysis (3h).[br/][li] Assessment of economic impacts and natural resources (14h).[br/][li] Applied environmental economic modeling (14h).[br/][li] The economics of sustainable development (8h).[br/][li] Environmental policy, in particular for climate protection and climate change mitigation and adaptation (14h).[br/]
free_text.Note: This course will be organised in half- or full-day blocs over a few weeks
